title: Taliyah
body: Hello! i know that no one probably knows the answer... but does anyone know how much taliyah will be?

replies.body:
the same as all new champions.

7800 IP and 975 RP on release.

Will drop down to 6300 IP after a week.

Will it get cheaper? like not all champs are 6300 obv

(soz i noob)
Not for a while. Here is the schedule for [price reductions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083304-Permanent-Champion-Price-Reduction)
